subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Stopping 40 of 41 Los Angeles shots, including all 15 in the third period, Lundqvist rescued the Rangers again in Game 4 of the Stanley Cup finals.
snippet: Stopping 40 of 41 Los Angeles shots, including all 15 in the third period, Lundqvist rescued the Rangers again in Game 4 of the Stanley Cup finals.
